    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        void addListener(java.util.Observer observer)
        + Add listener to the application.
        Parameters:
        observer - the observer that will get the events messages.

      • changeAgentStatus

        void changeAgentStatus(java.lang.String agentId,
                     boolean isLogin,
                     Activity activity)
        Change the status of the agent. The agent can be login or logout. Cause to recalculation of the event schedule.
        Parameters:
        agentId - The id of the agent that the agent wants to change its status.
        isLogin - The new status of the agent. True if the agent is login now and false otherwise.
        activity - The android activity that the agent arrived from.

      • changeItemStatus

        void changeItemStatus(Context context,
                    java.lang.String itemId,
                    ItemState newItemState)
        Change the status of the given item.
        Parameters:
        item - The item that should be changed its state.
        newItemState - The item new state.

      • completeActivity

        void completeActivity(Context context,
                    java.lang.String activityId)
        Mark the activity as completed.
        Parameters:
        context - The context that the agent arrived from (For example: the activity that call this function)
        activityId - The id of the completed activity.

      • createNewActivity

        void createNewActivity(Context context,
                     Activity newActivity)
        Create new MoVA Activity. Cause to recalculation of the event schedule.
        Parameters:
        context - The context that the agent arrived from (For example: the activity that call this function)
        newActivity -

      • findItemLocation

        Location findItemLocation(java.lang.String itemId,
                        Context context)
        Returns the location of the given item.
        Parameters:
        itemId - The id of the requested item.
        context - The context that the agent arrived from (For example: the activity that call this function)
        Returns:
        The location of the requested item.

      • getAllActivities

        java.util.List<Activity> getAllActivities(java.lang.String agentId)
        Returns all the event activities.
        Parameters:
        agentId - The id of the agent that request the activities.
        Returns:
        list of all the activities in the event.

      • getSchedule

        java.util.List<Activity> getSchedule(Context context)
        Returns the current agent schedule.
        Parameters:
        context - The context that the agent arrived from (For example: the activity that call this function)
        Returns:
        List of the current agent activities.

      • postponeActivity

        void postponeActivity(Context context,
                    java.lang.String activityId,
                    long addedTime)
        Postpone the activity according to the given added time. Cause to recalculation of the event schedule.
        Parameters:
        context - The context that the agent arrived from (For example: the activity that call this function)
        activityId - The id of the postponed activity.
        addedTime - The time that the agent want to add to the activity in minutes.

      • recalculate

        void recalculate(Context context)
        Recalculate all the activities in the event and send new schedule to every agent.
        Parameters:
        activity - The android activity that the agent arrived from.

      • register

        void register(Context context)
        Register the agent to Google C2dm service by asking registrationId.
        Parameters:
        context - The context that the agent arrived from (For example: the activity that call this function)

      • registerAgent

        void registerAgent(Context context,
                 java.lang.String RegistrationId,
                 java.lang.String AgentType)
        Register the agent to the communication server and add him to the server database and to the client database. In addition, asking for the list of items in the communication server in order to keep the items list.
        Parameters:
        context - The context that the agent arrived from (For example: the activity that call this function)
        RegistrationId - C2dm registrationID of the agent.
        AgentType - The new agent type.

      • startActivity

        void startActivity(java.lang.String activityId)
        Mark that the activity was started.
        Parameters:
        activityId - The id of the activity.
